(岸根公園) is  a very small station on the Yokohama city subway. Yokohama city is in
, in the central part of Honshu island,

. 

The next station is Shin-Yokohama. The Shinkansen stops at Shin-Yokohama.
Take the Yokohama city subway(横浜市営地下鉄) from

(横浜) for Azamino.
It takes 9minutes. (￥230)

Take the Yokohama city subway from Shin-Yokohama(新横浜) for Shonandai.
It takes 2minutes.(￥200)

value: address=The next at Kishine koen Station

content=Kishine Park is not the famous park in the area, but it’s a big park. In spring, many elementary students and kindergarten children often come to Kishine Park for picnics. You can see many cherry blossoms from the middle of March to early April. They are very beautiful. In spring, many people visit Kishine Park, and they do Ohanami. (Ohanami is going to see the cherry blossoms at the park, and drinking sake under the cherry blossom.)

There are 2 baseball grounds. The games are usually played until the night.
hours=Open 9AM-9PM  Monday, the next day of holiday, end of year and new year is closing

content=Kanagawa Budokan is near to Kishine Park. It takes 3 minutes from Kishine koen station.
Kanagawa Budokan is the military arts hall. It has training in Japanese fencing, judo, archery. The tournaments are often done. Many people from elementary school students to adults are visit there.

content=It’s old street. There used to be many stores, but now there are only a few stores. There are small restaurants, a book store, a bicycle shop, cheap sweets stores, and pubs.
Most stores didn’t open the weekend and late at night.

At the first Saturday in December, it holds a meeting of rice-cake making. You can eat rice cakes then and there.
 
Most buildings are kept as it was Showa era. Cheap sweets stores are specially old stores. You can buy many kinds of cheap sweets.
You can feel Showa era atmosphere.
hours=Lunch 11:00AM-2:00PM Monday to Saturday, Dinner 5:00PM-10:00PM Monday to Saturday

content=There is in Rokkakubashi kitamachi street of stores. It takes 5minuits from Kishine koen station. It spread by word of mouth among local people, it’s the hiding restaurant. A conger is the best seafood for sushi in there. 
You can’t take a meal at there without a reservation. 
It’s closed on Sunday; Saturday’s night is crowded specially. 
Eating in restaurant is the best of method, but you can have sushi delivered.
The master likes a festival. You can hear many story of Japanese traditional festival.
